content:
ailyFlightHour:**
`FLIGHT_TIME`
**DailyEqu:**
`EQUIVALENT_FH`
**TotalDutyTime:**
Sum(`ALT_DUTY_TIME`)| |rank|**Equ/EquCycle &
FlightHour/Landing &
TotalEqu/TotalEquCycle &
TotalFlightHour/TotalLanding:**
`XCREW.DUTY d`, `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY id`,
`XCREW.QUALIFICATION q`, `XCREW.RANK r`
**DutyTime &
TotalDutyTime:**
`XCREW.DAILY_ACCOUNT da`, `XCREW.QUALIFICATION q`,
`XCREW.RANK r`|**Equ/EquCycle &
FlightHour/Landing &
TotalEqu/TotalEquCycle &
TotalFlightHour/TotalLanding:**
`d.TLC`, `d.ASSIGNED_RANK`,
`id.DAY_OF_ORIGIN`, `q.TLC`,
`q.valid_since_dt`, `q.valid_until_dt`,
`q.TYPE`, `q.RANK`,
`r.RANK`, `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT`,
`r.SHORT_NAME_TRANS`
**DutyTime &
TotalDutyTime:**
`da.tlc`, `da.date_`, `q.TLC`,
`q.valid_since_dt`, `q.valid_until_dt`,
`q.TYPE`, `q.RANK`,
`r.RANK`, `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT`,
`r.SHORT_NAME_TRANS`|

Equ/EquCycle & FlightHour/Landing & TotalEqu/TotalEquCycle & TotalFlightHour/TotalLanding:

  • when `r.RANK` = `d.ASSIGNED_RANK` then `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT` & `r.SHORT_NAME_TRANS`
  • when `d.TLC` = `q.TLC` and `id.DAY_OF_ORIGIN` >= `q.valid_since_dt` and `id.DAY_OF_ORIGIN` <= `q.valid_until_dt` then `q.TYPE` 
  • when `q.TYPE` = “F” then `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT` else `r.SHORT_NAME_TRANS`

DutyTime & TotalDutyTime:

  • when `da.tlc` = q.TLC and `da.date_` >= `q.valid_since_dt` and `da.date_` <= `q.valid_until_dt` then `q.TYPE` 
  • when `r.RANK` = `q.RANK` then `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT` & `r.SHORT_NAME_TRANS`
  • when `q.TYPE` = “F” then `r.SHORT_NAME_FCT` else `r.SHORT_NAME_TRANS`

DailyFlightHour & DailyEqu:

  • The field is set to "*" in the query.
